id.description: The ID of the outbound route

name.description: The name of the outbound route

division.description: The division information associated with the outbound route

selfUri.description: The self URI of the division

descriptions.description: Additional descriptions about the outbound route

version.description: The version of the outbound route

dateCreated.description: The date and time when the outbound route was created

dateModified.description: The date and time when the outbound route was last modified

modifiedBy.description: The user who last modified the outbound route

createdBy.description: The user who created the outbound route

state.description: The state of the outbound route

modifiedByApp.description: The application that was used to last modify the outbound route

createdByApp.description: The application that was used to create the outbound route

classificationTypes.description: The classification types associated with the outbound route

enabled.description: Indicates whether the outbound route is enabled or not

distribution.description: The distribution associated with the outbound route

externalTrunkBases.description: The external trunk bases associated with the outbound route

id.description: The ID of the external trunk base

name.description: The name of the external trunk base

selfUri.description: The self URI of the external trunk base

site.description: The site information associated with the outbound route

selfUri.description: The self URI of the site

managed.description: Indicates whether the outbound route is managed or not

selfUri.description: The self URI of the outbound route
